meanings.def: a list showing the tasks that different people have to do at different times within an organization
examples: The boss has drawn up a duty roster.
Kelly has an excellent chance of making the opening-day roster.

meanings.def: a list of the names of people who are available to do a job, play in a team, etc.
examples: They have a number of outstanding players on their roster.
The firm has built up an impressive roster of clients over the past ten years.
The record company confirmed that the band had been dropped from the roster.
The team has ten rookies on the active roster.

meanings.def: to put somebody’s name on a roster
examples: be rostered (for something/to do something) The driver was rostered for Sunday.
